entry.title: AleksandrFurmenkovOfficial/ai-code-review: AI Code Review is a lightweight, simple GitHub Action that supports various AI models to analyze and provide feedback on your code. This GitHub Action helps improve code quality by automatically reviewing pull requests, focusing on specified file extensions, and excluding specific paths.
entry.content: AI Code Review is a lightweight, simple GitHub Action that supports various AI models to analyze and provide feedback on your code. This GitHub Action helps improve code quality by automatically reviewing pull requests, focusing on specified file extensions, and excluding specific paths.
